channel.title: Survey on Paul Simmering's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Survey on Paul Simmering's blog

item.title: Do Internet Users have a Positive Willingness-To-Pay for Ad-free Usage of Websites?
item.description: I conducted an online survey and economic experiment and analyzed the results using logistic regression. The thesis was supervised by Prof. Dr. Gerhard Riener at University of Mannheim. Photo by Justus Menke on Unsplash
